name: User Welcome eMail Template
subject: Welcome to Future Of Digital Signage
html:
Hi [NAME],
Welcome to Maia Signage! Your 7-day free Trial starts today.
What happens next? Keep an eye on your inbox as we’ll be sending you the best tips for Maia Signage to make sure you get the most out of it.
Want to get things done faster? Choose a plan below:
[plan details or a link]
If you’re interested in learning more about Maia Signage or need help deciding on the best plan for your business, feel free to contact our support team at any time. We’re always here to help you in any way we can.
Have an awesome day,
Maia Signage CEO
